function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited studies quantifying the effect of opening windows on the air change rate in homes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Frequent opening and closing of windows and doors during experiments","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of measurement of outdoor and indoor temperatures and wind speed during air change experiments","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection of wind data at a height of 3.05 m in the backyard only","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recirculated air in hvac system","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Greater temperature range between winter and summer","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to air change rate experiments and no noticeable wind","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate temperature measurements","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of wind data during air change rate experiments","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of sulfur hexafluoride as a tracer gas","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent handling of tracer cylinders between california and virginia houses","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of b&k multigas photoacoustic analyzers for measuring sf6 concentration","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential cross-contamination between houses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of air change rate","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air exchange rates in different zones of the house","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive reading of sf6 under clean air conditions and in cases of nonzero residual levels of sf6 in the house","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tracer gas concentration uniformity among and within rooms","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strong stack effect in the virginia house, resulting in uneven tracer gas concentration on each floor","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential reverse stack effect at the virginia house during the summer months","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tracer gas release leading to uneven distribution and concentration of contaminants","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Multizone situation created by opening windows allows for the rapid spread of contaminants","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Different tracer concentrations in multiple compartments can lead to uneven distribution of contaminants","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of tracer decay rates","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overestimation of air change rates","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unreliable conclusions on air flow dynamics","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bimodal distribution of air change rates","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Meteorological parameters affecting air change rates","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in air change rate due to window opening width and location.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid tracer decay or ’whoosh’ observed after opening a window, leading to a short-lived, significant dilution of existing tracer gas in the immediate air volume.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid clearing out ’whoosh’ effect of tracer gas after window opening","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tracer gas concentrations decayed to below detection limits within a short time after window opening","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of meteorological factors on air change rates may impact the spread of contagious diseases in indoor environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased air change rate due to window opening","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in air change rate due to window opening","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of turbulent eddies at the window opening","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate air change rate measurement due to transient effects","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of quantified relationship between air change rate and window opening width in real homes.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effect of wind speed and occupancy on air change rates in homes.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High air change rates due to occupant behavior","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to differentiate between air loss to outdoors and to adjacent apartments","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low air change rates in occupied houses","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased correlation between indoor and outdoor pollutant concentrations","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant increase in air change rate with multiple open windows","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited information for policy decisions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unknown effects of anti-contagion policies on infection rates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of historical precedent for the current pathogen and policies","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Costs of anti-contagion policies are visible, while health benefits are unseen","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Business restrictions increase unemployment and school closures affect educational outcomes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Compilation of subnational data on daily infection rates and policy deployments","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Almost perfect exponential growth of covid-19 infections due to susceptibility of populations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
